name: Masters of Stars
description:
Masters of Stars it's a game where you and your opponent fight each other in a space battle. Your units in the game are presented in the form of game cards. To achieve victory, you must play your cards and use card abilities to obtain resources, which can then be used to buy new cards and attack the enemy.

Game features
  • 48 differend card variants!
  • Diffirent abilities to combine and use!
  • Fast gameplay - one match take from 10 to 15 minutes!
  • Three difficulty levels - start from easy and learn to master!
  •  Atmospheric soundtrack and sound effects!
Credits

This game core mechanics was highly inspired by board game Star Realms.

This game used many third-party assets, all their authors are listed in game titles. Press "Credits" button in game to see them.
